Collectibles - Collect Gem

We want to add the full size gems into the rooms to collect. Now lets add 5 gems in rm_castle and 5 gems in rm_desert.

rm_castle

rm_desert

Now the player will be picking up these gems, so they will disapear when the player collects them. We don’ t want to have a variable saved on the gem. Lets keep track of it in a game controller. Add a new game object and call it obj_game_controller.

Add a Create event to obj_game_controller and add a variable to track how many gems we have collected.

obj_game_controller: Create Event

Drag and drop obj_game_controller into rm_castle

rm_castle

Now when the gem collides with the player we want the gemScore count to go up by 1 and the gem to dissapear. Create a new collision on the gem object with the player and add a point, destroy the gem and add an effect to sell the interaction and give positive feedback to the user action:

obj_gem: Collision | obj_player Event

Run the game by pressing the Play Button. Go and collect the gems. They should disappear with a simple particle effect like so:
